thread.title: 5 heroes of foiled European train attack
thread.title_full: 5 heroes of foiled European train attack | News24

author: news24.com
title: 5 heroes of foiled European train attack
text:
Washington - Three American friends on a European vacation found themselves hailed as heroes on Saturday after subduing a gunman on a train as it sped through the countryside on its way to Paris, with assists from a British businessman and a French passenger.
One of the trio - two US servicemen and a college student - was recovering from wounds suffered in Friday's attack, as plaudits poured in from US President Barack Obama, French President Francois Hollande and others.
Obama called the three on Saturday, and commended them on their "extraordinary bravery", saying their actions had forestalled an even greater tragedy, the White House said.
Here are the five and the role they played in foiling what could have been a mass killing:
